name: Kodaki
description:
The spirits of the forest will give you the ability to transform into different animals (flying squirrel, chameleon and boar). You can use their skills to solve puzzles and platformer areas, going through the magical woods with the objective of recovering the water that gives life to all the living beings.

TEAM

Miquel Navarro  -  Designer

Miquel Valverde   -  Programmer / Producer

Dídac Padilla - Programmer

Lara Ríos -  Artist
